questions.question: この本は図書館で（＿）ことができます。
questions.hint:
図書館としょかん (toshokan) - library
借かりる (kariru) - to borrow

explanation.correct:
✅ Correct!
借りるかりる means 'to borrow'. You can borrow books at a library.

  • 借りるかりる (kariru): to borrow
  • 遊ぶあそぶ (asobu): to play
  • 飲むのむ (nomu): to drink
  • 話すはなす (hanasu): to talk

Sentence meaning: You can borrow this book at the library.

❌ Incorrect.
The correct answer is 借りるかりる (kariru): to borrow.

  • 飲むのむ: to drink
  • 話すはなす: to talk

Sentence meaning: You can borrow this book at the library.
